DOC.brief_summary: This 6 week study characterize safety , tolerability effect PF-05175157 administer 6 week subject moderate severe acne vulgaris .
DOC.brief_title: Study Of Safety , Tolerability And Effects Of PF-05175157 In Adults With Moderate To Severe Acne Vulgaris
DOC.criteria: Males 18 year old diagnose moderate severe acne vulgaris otherwise healthy . Normal spirometry screening ( FEV1 FVC ( Forced Vital Capacity ) least 80 % predict ) . Minimum 20 inflammatory lesion face . Willing discontinue acne treatment prior study period followup . Subjects active nodulocystic acne . Subjects unwilling comply lifestyle guideline , commit study visit , perform study procedure . History dry eye know disease affect sclera cornea . History pulmonary disease inability adequately perform testing .
